title: Acupuncture at BACH — Bay Area Community Health
description: Bay Area Community Health offers acupuncture services to assist the treatment of various long and short health problems. Acupuncture can assist with chronic pain from arthritis, back pain, headaches and migraines, sports injuries and menstruation.
cleaned_text: Bay Area Community Health offers acupuncture services to assist the treatment of various health problems. Acupuncture can help relieve chronic (long-term) pain, such as: Other conditions acupuncture may help include: Cancer and cancer treatment side effects Face pain and other nerve discomfort Immune system problems Infertility Irritable bowel syndrome Menopause and hot flashes Pregnancy discomforts Repetitive strain disorders and overuse syndrome
